resources.string: Q1:Which answer expresses the meaning of the specified word best?
Q2:Which number logically follows this series?
Q3:Which conclusion follows from the statements with absolute certainty?
ex:None of the stamp collectors is an architect./n All the drones are stamp collectors.
Q4:What is the correct answer to the following problem.

ex:Tom has a new set of golf clubs. Using a club 8, the ball travels an average distance of 100 meters. Using a club 7, the ball travels an average distance of 108 meters. Using a club 6, the ball travels an average distance of 114 meters. How far will the ball go if Tom uses a club 5?
Q5:Which word(s) can logically replace the question mark?
ex:Water is to a pipe as ? is to a wire.
